full_summary:
# General Contracting and Construction Services For Tenant Improvement Project
## Background
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites bidders to submit proposals for the provision of general contracting and construction services for a tenant improvement project in Yellowknife, Northwest Territories.

## Project Overview
The project involves the provision of full commercial construction services for a mixed-use tenant improvement project in a light industrial building and associated compound space. The scope includes architectural, structural, mechanical, electrical, and security improvements, as well as supply and installation of specialized equipment. The project covers approximately 200m2u of conventional office space and 900m2u of special purpose space. The anticipated in-service date is March 1, 2023.

## Mandatory Requirements
To be considered for this project, bidders must meet the following mandatory requirements:

* Provide two (2) reference projects undertaken by the bidder within the last 5 years, relating to commercial and mixed-use construction.
* Have a valid Procurement Business Number (PBN) and register for it if necessary.
* Comply with Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements and Tli?cho Land Claims and Self-Government Agreement.

## Tendering Information
The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the trade agreements provisions apply. The procurement category is construction services. This is an open bidding process, and all interested suppliers can submit a bid.

## Submission Requirements
Bidders are encouraged to submit their qualifications electronically through the Canada Post Corporation's (CPC) Connect Service application. To request a CPC Connect conversation, please email [roreceptionSoumissions.wrbidreceiving@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:roreceptionSoumissions.wrbidreceiving@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or contact the bid receiving office by phone or fax.

## Notice to Suppliers
Faxed submissions will be accepted at 1-418-566-6167. Hard copy submissions will not be accepted.

## Bidder Contact Information

PWGSC invites bidders to submit proposals for the provision of general contracting and construction services for a tenant improvement project in Yellowknife, Northwest Territories. The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
